title: Bump enshrined/svg-sanitize from 0.10.0 to 0.12.0
Bump enshrined/svg-sanitize from 0.12.0 to 0.13.1
Bump acorn from 5.7.3 to 5.7.4

nodes.bodyText:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available. If you'd rather skip all updates until the next major or minor version, let me know by commenting @dependabot ignore this major version or @dependabot ignore this minor version.
If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Bump jquery from 3.4.1 to 3.5.0

nodes.bodyText: Looks like jquery is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.
